reviews.name: Esther Howard
reviews.text: There was a small mistake in the order. In return, I got the correct order and I could keep the wrong one for myself.

reviews.name: Albert Flores
reviews.text: I ordered on Friday evening and on Monday at 12:30 the package was with me. I have never encountered such a fast order processing.
